docs.snippet: Time is running short for a new team to sign an accord with the Bloomberg administration that would involve tax breaks, public land and public financing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Time is running short for a new team to sign an accord with the Bloomberg administration that would involve tax breaks, public land and public financing.
docs.abstract: Owner of New York's new professional soccer team and Bloomberg administration are nearing tentative agreement to build city's first soccer-only venue; deal for New York City Football Club, partnership between Manchester City Football Club of England and the Yankees, to play in $350 million, 28,000-seat stadium in the Bronx may be signed before Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio takes office.

headline.main: Deal for Bronx Soccer Stadium in Works as Clock Ticks
headline.print_headline: Soccer Team and City May Sign Stadium Deal Before de Blasio Takes Office

keywords.value: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
keywords.name: organizations

docs.snippet: Tweaks, not major reforms, are what might emerge after some of the most important people in college sports met in Manhattan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tweaks, not major reforms, are what might emerge after some of the most important people in college sports met in Manhattan.
docs.abstract: Greg Bishop On College Sports column analyzes meeting between athletic directors, administrators and NCAA officials in Manhattan, saying talks seemed to have leaned toward rule 'tweaks' rather than major reforms.

docs.snippet: PepsiCo has won the business of Buffalo Wild Wings. The two plan new menu items combining products from both companies....
docs.lead_paragraph: PepsiCo has won the business of Buffalo Wild Wings. The two plan new menu items combining products from both companies.
docs.abstract: PepsiCo, in unusual deal that goes far beyond soda wars, will announce it is unseating Coca-Cola as beverage supplier to restaurant chain Buffalo Wild Wings; deal is biggest sign so far of how PepsiCo is deploying its thriving snacks business and Quaker, which it also owns, to offset declines in its traditional soft drinks business.

headline.main: Pepsi Deal Underscores an Emphasis on Snacks
headline.print_headline: Pepsi Deal Underscores An Emphasis On Snacks

docs.snippet: In Ray Hudson’s soccer analysis on the beIN Sport network, players’ shots curve like Bernini sculptures, and literary and math references are all parts of the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: In Ray Hudson’s soccer analysis on the beIN Sport network, players’ shots curve like Bernini sculptures, and literary and math references are all parts of the game.
docs.abstract: Profile of Ray Hudson, soccer analyst for the young beIN sports network who has developed a cult following for his flowery, clever and comically accurate commentary.

headline.main: Vocal Acrobat Mixes Soccer Calls With Awe
headline.print_headline: A Rainbow of Words Spices Color Commentary
